level.heading: Transition provisions; applicability of chapter.
level.text: Chapter 13 [of this title] shall apply to any tax sale made or instituted, and any agreement executed between the District and any third party with respect to such sale, before January 1, 2001. This chapter shall apply to any tax sale made or instituted (or which could have been made or instituted), and any agreement executed between the District and any third party with respect to such sale, after December 31, 2000.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see ยง 7 of Real Property Tax Clarity and Litter Control Administration Temporary Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Law 14-8, June 13, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 5916).

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 7 of Real Property Tax Clarity and Litter Control Administration Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14- 22, March 16, 2001, 48 DCR 2706).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 13-305, see notes under ยง 47-901.
